projects.title: Flask cricket app
details: Created an application for keeping track of the 2021 Cricket World Cup.
Manipulated relavant data using Python, connecting it to the front-end using Flask and Jinja.

projects.title: BBC Sleighride
details: Developed an educational application about how Christmas is celebrated around the world.
API calls using non-relational databases and express server configuration.
Version 2; built with Typescript, Redux and styled components.

projects.title: Clanhub
details: An open source project for Code Clan alumni to maintain and strengthen their community
Authentication using firebase, allowing users to signup, login and contribute to posts on a filterable formum.
CRUD functionality managed through a Spring Boot API.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio
details: A personal portfoilo site built using Astro, Tailwind and Sanity.
This site can also handle email forwarding to my inbox, stay tuned for updates.
